column4: Ky:running 4 filled browsers, a vbox /w two machines, music, irc, and a bunch of daemnons :  2,5G
really. humm. my server (comapq computer with 1.5 Ghz AMD Athlon, 1.25 GIG ram) is just going to be running VBox's with Server2003 and NT4. Think Ubuntu is the OS for me?
aeon: well i have other plans for the future. ie. Dail in server for dreamcast systems and VPN's. Router for an internet connection.

will work, as I don't use swap, but you  are really short of ram for that, and will have to higher you're vm's ram for install or become retarded before their install finishes, consider a minimal install, so you only get what you want on the host
